card.name: 7 of Pentacles
card.meaning: This card signifies the importance of patience and long-term planning. It encourages you to take a step back and evaluate your progress, reminding you that success takes time and effort. Embrace the journey and trust the process. By staying dedicated to your goals and nurturing your efforts, you can achieve lasting results. This is a time to focus on perseverance and to remain committed to your vision for the future.
